articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Australia overtake India to grab top spot in WTC points table; check standings - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Australia registered a 3-0 Test series win over Pakistan, registering a comprehensive 8-wicket win in the final match in Sydney. | Cricket
articles.content: Australia have surged to the summit of the latest ICC World Test Championship (WTC) standings, overtaking India after the 3-0 clean-sweep victory in the Test series against Pakistan. The updated rank… [+2046 chars]
